backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing brand kit storage with access control and functions to get, save, and clear kit elements.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for various frontend files, mainly covering Studio workflow, components, and state logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying theme provider and rendering StudioPage with notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout with header, hero banner, footer, and social links wrapping child content.
frontend/src/features/studio/components/: Displays a grid of uploaded or URL-based assets with thumbnails, error states, and a remove button.
Generates and displays multiple copy variants based on brief, tone, and length, allowing users to select one.
Generates creative previews using brand assets, settings, and reference images, with options for editing and downloading.
Validates and loads an image from a URL, then adds it as an asset with error handling and loading states.
Allows selecting or clearing a reference image from available assets with visual selection indicators.
Shows a completion checklist summarizing brand kit readiness including brief, colors, logo, and assets.
frontend/src/features/studio/generation/: Builds a creative image on a canvas by layering backgrounds, reference images, overlays, logos, and text based on settings.
Provides tone- and length-based text templates for generating marketing copy variants.
Renders various background styles on a canvas using brand colors and a seeded RNG.
Generates and renders tinted flash overlay effects on a canvas using deterministic random instances.
Draws a logo on a canvas with configurable position, scale, and visibility treatments.
Simulates an image editing workflow with progress updates and returns a lightly altered version of the input image.
Implements a deterministic pseudo-random number generator with int and float helpers.
Defines metadata for available style presets including names, descriptions, and characteristics.
frontend/src/features/studio/state/persi: Saves, loads, and normalizes studio state in localStorage with backwardâ€‘compatibility defaults.
frontend/src/features/studio/state/studi: Defines TypeScript interfaces for studio state including brand kit, assets, copy variants, and creative settings.
frontend/src/features/studio/state/useSt: Implements a Zustand store for managing and persisting studio state with update helpers and default settings.
frontend/src/features/studio/steps/Asset: UI step for uploading image assets or adding them via URL, with validation and list management.
frontend/src/features/studio/steps/Brand: UI step for uploading a logo and selecting up to four brand colors, updating the brand kit state.
frontend/src/features/studio/steps/Brief: UI step for entering a campaign brief with example prompts and state updates.
frontend/src/features/studio/steps/Outpu: Displays generated copy and creative previews with a tabbed interface and summary checklist.
Main Studio workflow component managing step navigation, layout, and loading persistent state.
frontend/src/features/studio/utils/asset: Provides validation for uploaded files and image URLs with size and format checks.
frontend/src/features/studio/utils/image: Loads an image from a URL and converts it to a data URL using a canvas.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login flow, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps react-query hooks to fetch and save the caller's BrandKit using the actor API, with caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus global body and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors from CSS variables, layout settings, and utility plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, requirements, and pending requests related to image editing and UI behavior.
